title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 8 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2018 to 2016, slightly increasing from 2016 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2013, and lastly gradually decreasing from 2013 to 2011.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2014.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 7114.0 was recorded at Year 2014
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 3320.0 was recorded at Year 2011
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2011.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2018 to 2016.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2015 to 2014.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2015.
